languages.text: {n}Видимо, Иремерисс и впрямь поступила дерзко, похитив столь ценных пленников и рискуя развязать войну со своими ксенокузенами.{/n}
{n}It is clear that Yremeryss acted recklessly by taking such valuable prisoners and she risked starting a war with her xenos cousins.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Видимо, Иремерисс и впрямь поступила дерзко, похитив столь ценных пленников и рискуя развязать войну со своими ксенокузенами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}It is clear that Yremeryss acted recklessly by taking such valuable prisoners and she risked starting a war with her xenos cousins.{/n}
{n}It is clear that Yremeryss acted recklessly by taking such valuable prisoners and she risked starting a war with her xenos cousins.{/n}
{n}It is clear that Yremeryss acted recklessly by taking such valuable prisoners and she risked starting a war with her xenos cousins.{/n}
{n}It is clear that Yremeryss acted recklessly by taking such valuable prisoners and she risked starting a war with her xenos cousins.{/n}

languages.text: {n}很显然，伊芮梅莉斯的行为非常鲁莽。她冒着与她的异形表亲开战的风险，抓来了如此有价值的俘虏。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is clear that Yremeryss acted recklessly by taking such valuable prisoners and she risked starting a war with her xenos cousins.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}很显然，伊芮梅莉斯的行为非常鲁莽。她冒着与她的异形表亲开战的风险，抓来了如此有价值的俘虏。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Está claro que Yremeryss fue imprudente al tomar prisioneros tan valiosos, una decisión que podría haber causado una guerra con sus primos xenos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is clear that Yremeryss acted recklessly by taking such valuable prisoners and she risked starting a war with her xenos cousins.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Está claro que Yremeryss fue imprudente al tomar prisioneros tan valiosos, una decisión que podría haber causado una guerra con sus primos xenos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}イレメリスがこのような貴重な捕虜を奪うという無謀な行動をとり、異種族の血族たちと戦を始める危険を冒したことは明らかだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is clear that Yremeryss acted recklessly by taking such valuable prisoners and she risked starting a war with her xenos cousins.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}イレメリスがこのような貴重な捕虜を奪うという無謀な行動をとり、異種族の血族たちと戦を始める危険を冒したことは明らかだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yremeryss hat offensichtlich sehr fahrlässig gehandelt, indem sie solch wertvolle Gefangene genommen hat, und sie hat einen Krieg mit ihren Xenos-Vettern riskiert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is clear that Yremeryss acted recklessly by taking such valuable prisoners and she risked starting a war with her xenos cousins.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yremeryss hat offensichtlich sehr fahrlässig gehandelt, indem sie solch wertvolle Gefangene genommen hat, und sie hat einen Krieg mit ihren Xenos-Vettern riskiert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il est évident qu'Yremeryss a fait preuve d'imprudence en capturant des individus aussi importants et qu'elle a bien failli déclencher une guerre avec ses cousins xénos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is clear that Yremeryss acted recklessly by taking such valuable prisoners and she risked starting a war with her xenos cousins.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il est évident qu'Yremeryss a fait preuve d'imprudence en capturant des individus aussi importants et qu'elle a bien failli déclencher une guerre avec ses cousins xénos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yremeryss'in böylesine değerli tutsaklar alarak pervasızlık ettiği belli. Zeno akrabalarıyla savaşma riskini göze almış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is clear that Yremeryss acted recklessly by taking such valuable prisoners and she risked starting a war with her xenos cousins.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yremeryss'in böylesine değerli tutsaklar alarak pervasızca bir hareket yaptığı belli. Zeno kuzenleriyle savaşma riskini göze almış.{/n}
